values:
We've been doing alright, but it's not easy sometimes.
You'll never let me lose, please believe me, I'm grateful for you.
You always seem to be there, when I'm angry you don't care.
You give me what I need, a temporary release.
When you're in my arms I feel so safe 'cause you take me out of this so called life.
And I love the way your charms can take me away when I'm feeling down and I don't know why.

When I can't see past the rain you can keep me sane.
When I'm lying on my own you'll try to pleae me and I know I'm not alone
.

Made private with a secrecy charm Weakminded people who wear their hearts on their sleeve are like strings on a guitar. Sure to manipulate an individual string is easy to do and can produce some music, but manipulating many strings at once though more difficult before you master the art, creates a far more satisfactory melody. I will play the fools of Hogwarts like they were a fine Spanish guitar and they will dance to the music I write.

I can't escape this hell
So many times i've tried
But i'm still caged inside
Somebody get me through this nightmare
I can't control myself

So what if you can see the darkest side of me?
No one will ever change this animal I have become
Help me believe it's not the real me
Somebody help me tame this animal
(This animal, this animal)

I can't escape myself
(I can't escape myself)
So many times i've lied
(So many times i've lied)
But there's still rage inside
Somebody get me through this nightmare
I can't control myself

So what if you can see the darkest side of me?
No one will ever change this animal I have become
Help me believe it's not the real me
Somebody help me tame this animal I have become
Help me believe it's not the real me
Somebody help me tame this animal

Somebody help me through this nightmare
I can't control myself
Somebody wake me from this nightmare
I can't escape this hell

(This animal, this animal, this animal, this animal, this animal, this animal, this animal)

No one will ever change this animal I have become
